TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UnmanagedType extends System.Enum
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed UnmanagedType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定如何将参数或字段封送到非托管代码。

span.span: Identifies how to marshal parameters or fields to unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 带有属性的枚举 来指定如何在与非托管代码互操作过程中对类型进行封送处理。Use the enumeration with the attribute to specify how types are marshaled during interoperation with unmanaged code. 您可以使用此枚举来使用简单的值类型（ (I1、I2、I4、I8、R4、R8、U2、U4 和 U8) 、.NET Framework 中不可用的非托管类型以及各种其他类型）封送代码。You can use this enumeration to marshal code using simple value types (I1, I2, I4, I8, R4, R8, U2, U4, and U8), unmanaged types that are unavailable in the .NET Framework, and various miscellaneous types. 有关详细信息，请参阅[与非托管代码交互操作](/dotnet/framework/interop/)。For more information, see [Interoperating with Unmanaged Code](/dotnet/framework/interop/). ## Examples 下面的代码段演示如何在托管源代码中声明由 COM 组件实现的非托管接口。The following code fragment demonstrates how to declare, in managed source code, an unmanaged interface implemented by a COM component. 特性禁止将 `IMyStorage` 接口导出回来供 COM 使用。The attribute prevents the `IMyStorage` interface from being exported back for use by COM. (COM 客户端应直接使用现有 COM 组件。在此示例中 ) 指定多个 成员，这些成员表示原始 COM 接口使用的类型。(COM clients should use the existing COM component directly.) In this example, specifies several members, which represent the types used by the original COM interface. [!code-cpp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CPP/codefile2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CS/codefile2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/VB/codefile2.vb#2)]

AnsiBStr = 35

summary.span: ANSI 字符串是一个带有长度前缀的单字节字符串。

span.span: An ANSI character string that is a length-prefixed single byte.

summary.span: 可以在 数据类型上使用此成员。

span.span: You can use this member on the data type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType AsAny = int32(40)
AsAny = 40

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Marshalling arbitrary types may be unavailable in future releases. Please specify the type you wish to marshal as.")]
[<System.Obsolete("Marshalling arbitrary types may be unavailable in future releases. Please specify the type you wish to marshal as.")>]

summary.span: 一个动态类型，将在运行时确定对象的类型，并将该对象作为所确定的类型进行封送处理。

span.span: A dynamic type that determines the type of an object at run time and marshals the object as that type.

summary.span: 该成员仅对平台调用方法有效。

span.span: This member is valid for platform invoke methods only.

Bool = 2

span.span: A 4-byte Boolean value ( != 0, = 0).

summary.span: 这是 Win32 BOOL 类型。

span.span: This is the Win32 BOOL type.

BStr = 19

summary.span: 长度前缀为双字节的 Unicode 字符串。

span.span: A Unicode character string that is a length-prefixed double byte.

summary.span: 可以在 数据类型上使用此成员（它是 COM 中的默认字符串）。

span.span: You can use this member, which is the default string in COM, on the data type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType ByValArray = int32(30)
ByValArray = 30

summary.span: 当 属性被设置为 时，必须设置 字段以指示该数组中的元素数。

span.span: When the property is set to , the field must be set to indicate the number of elements in the array.

summary.span: 当需要区分字符串类型时， 字段可以选择包含数组元素的 。

span.span: The field can optionally contain the of the array elements when it is necessary to differentiate among string types.

summary.span: 此 只可用于结构中其元素作为字段出现的数组。

span.span: You can use this only on an array that whose elements appear as fields in a structure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType ByValTStr = int32(23)
ByValTStr = 23

summary.span: 用于在结构中出现的内联定长字符数组。

span.span: Used for in-line, fixed-length character arrays that appear within a structure.

summary.span: 类型的行为类似于结构中大小固定的字符串 C 样式（例如，char s[5]）。

span.span: types behave like C-style, fixed-size strings inside a structure (for example, char s[5]).

summary.span: 与 一起使用的字符类型由应用于包含结构的 属性的 参数确定。

span.span: The character type used with is determined by the argument of the attribute applied to the containing structure.

summary.span: 应始终使用 字段来指示数组的大小。

span.span: Always use the field to indicate the size of the array.

span.span: Used on a to marshal the decimal value as a COM currency type instead of as a .

span.span: It cannot be used on fields.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType LPArray = int32(42)
LPArray = 42

summary.span: 指向 C 样式数组的第一个元素的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the first element of a C-style array.

summary.span: 当从托管到非托管代码进行封送处理时，该数组的长度由托管数组的长度确定。

span.span: When marshaling from managed to unmanaged code, the length of the array is determined by the length of the managed array.

summary.span: 从非托管到托管代码进行封送处理时，将根据 和 字段确定该数组的长度，当需要区分字符串类型时，还可以后跟数组中元素的非托管类型。

span.span: When marshaling from unmanaged to managed code, the length of the array is determined from the and fields, optionally followed by the unmanaged type of the elements within the array when it is necessary to differentiate among string types.

summary.span: 该值仅支持平台调用而不支持 COM 互操作，因为不支持导出 类型的字符串。

span.span: This value is supported only for platform invoke and not for COM interop, because exporting a string of type is not supported.

summary.span: 一个值，该值使 Visual Basic 能够更改非托管代码中的字符串，并使结果在托管代码中反映出来。

span.span: A value that enables Visual Basic to change a string in unmanaged code and have the results reflected in managed code.

summary.span: 该值仅支持平台调用。

span.span: This value is only supported for platform invoke.
